TextBody:
Hello Corvin,

After some investigation, the fix will be applied in the next version of PingCastle 3.4 which will be available in May. Are you happy for me to close this ticket? You can always raise a new ticket for when 3.4 is out if you have any concerns.

Thank you,

Rej Uddin

Technical Support Team Lead

Phone: 1-949-407-5125 | Toll-free: 888-638-9749

TextBody:
Hello Corvin,

Thank you Corvin. Following this email, you will receive an automated confirmation that the case is closed, along with the ability to re-open the case if any related errors return. In addition, you will also receive a separate email with a survey where you can let us know how we did. Feel free to leave any feedback via the survey link!

Thank you,

Rej Uddin

Technical Support Team Lead
